name: Little Snow
description:
This is my first game! It's tiny, and made in GB Studio. You can play it on a real gameboy if you want (or so I'm told, I don't have one).

It's got action, puzzles, adventure, intrigue! And a little story.

Controls Laptop/Desktop Browser Arrow keys or WASD to move; Z to interactMobile/Tablet On-screen controls should appear EmulatorDirection pad to move, A to interact

Based on Snow White, but there's nuns instead of dwarves. Most of the music is based on public domain tunes, a little is original.
